Use: Thrip leveraged PowerShell to run commands to download payloads, traverse the compromised networks, and carry out reconnaissance. [1]

Technique: Exfiltration Over Alternative Protocol: Exfiltration Over Unencrypted Non-C2 Protocol
Use: Thrip has used WinSCP to exfiltrate data from a targeted organization over FTP. [1]
Thrip has obtained and used tools such as Mimikatz and PsExec . [1]
Thrip used a cloud-based remote access software called LogMeIn for their attacks. [1]
